name: Cotton Mayhem
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 40 under 72 hours.

Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/cotton-mayhem

It is possible that a sheep gets stuck near a tree or in the barn so try rotating the camera if new sheep are not spawning.  You can do this by holding down the right mouse button and moving the mouse. Move around with WASD.

WARNING: For some players the music is too loud so turn down your volume before a new game.
